revised_title: On the Structure and Biology of Archotermopsis: Descriptions of New Species of Intestinal Protozoa and General Observations on the Isoptera
tldr: This paper investigates the structure and biology of Archotermopsis, a primitive termite species, and describes new species of intestinal protozoa found within them. The author also provides general observations on the Isoptera, discussing topics such as polymorphism, the presence of intestinal protozoa, and the distribution of termites in the North Western Himalayas.
